name: Free education
des: Much of the food we eat is grown, harvested, and then transported to warehouses where it is sorted, packed, and stored until it can be sold and transported to the final destination.

name: Distribution of food
des: Traders buy produce in bulk from all over the world, and then they sell this produce to supermarkets, retailers, and wholesalers. If there are disruptions in this system or if food cannot be sold fast enough
